# Pull Request Template

## Description
Provide a short description of what this PR does.  
Include context, why this change is needed, and what it affects.

## Related Issue
Link the issue this PR addresses (if any):  

## Changes Made
- List the changes made in this PR
- Example: Added main.c example for PWM module
- Example: Updated README with clarification

## Testing
- Describe how you tested your changes
- Hardware used (ATxmega128A1U, sensors, etc.)
- Simulation or real hardware

## Additional Notes
- Anything else reviewers should know
- Screenshots, diagrams, or links if needed

- Follow the existing folder/module structure  
- Keep code clean, modular, and commented  
- Use descriptive commit messages
